Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Acid Shield^reset; augment to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 也许有一天，我还会麻烦你这样的天才来帮助我，但是...我现在需要一个人思考一会儿，抱歉。
Texts.Eng: Perhaps one day I might call on your talents to help me with a little problem I am having...I'll need to consider.

You're probably starting to have some issues surviving by now in different biomes. So let's get you building ^green;augments^reset;! Show me an ^orange;Acid Shield^reset; augment made by your own two hands!
